personalInformation.aboutMe: Hello, my name is Vladimir and I'm experienced UI Engineer. I have taken a part in development many projects from scratch. I know how to create the web application, which will be easy expandable and show high performance. I like to work in team, but I also feel confidence working alone. I am able to solve any UI tasks and ready to help to reach your aims.
